info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 1:07PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Schenectady, southeastern Saratoga and southwestern Washington Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 107 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alplaus, or near Clifton Park, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clifton Park around 110 PM EDT. Country Knolls around 120 PM EDT. Mechanicville and Round Lake around 125 PM EDT. Milton, Ballston Spa and North Ballston Spa around 130 PM EDT. Saratoga Springs around 145 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Deans Corners, Glenridge, Grangerville, Harding Crossing, Willow Glen, Coons, Garrison Manor, Wayville, Aqueduct and Woodruff Heights. This includes the following highways... Interstate 890 between exits 1b and 8. Interstate 87 between exits 9 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
